const gaia::base::String &  accountType,
int32_t  updateWhenOpen,
int32_t  syncInterval,
int32_t  syncOptionsResId,
const gaia::base::String &  pkgName,
bool  override 
) [static]

Add an account type into SyncSettings.

Parameters:
contextthe given context
accountTypethe given account type
updateWhenOpenNOT_UPDATE_WHEN_OPEN:uncheck the update when open checkbox UPDATE_WHEN_OPEN:check the update when open checkbox NO_UPDATE_WHEN_OPEN_SETTING: hide the update when open check box
syncIntervalthe sync interval in seconds
syncOptionsResIdthe string array resource id to get the sync interval options
pkgNamethe package name of syncOptionsResId and the Receiver to receive ACTION_SYNC_SCHEDULE_CHANGE
overrideoverride the original setting
